Class: TurtleFormModule

TurtleFormModule(app, configs)

Class representing the form module in the application.

Constructor

new TurtleFormModule(app, configs)

Creates an instance of the form module.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
app Object

The application instance.
configs Object

Configuration options for the form module.

TurtleFormModule

Methods

The form element to validate.
